segment: Privacy Policy     Our commitment to privacy    Your privacy is important to us. To better protect your privacy we provide this notice explaining our online information practices and the choices you can make about the way your information is collected and used.

model_analysis.explanation: This segment is an introductory statement about the company's commitment to privacy and does not provide specific details about practices or policies.

segment: The information we collect    This notice applies to all information collected or submitted on any of Illini Media's websites including dailyillini.com. On some of our pages, you may have the option to create an account, make requests, register for contests, and/or submit content to our websites.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of information on Illini Media's websites, including creating accounts and submitting content, indicating collection on the website.

segment: The personal information collected at these pages are used to identify you as a user of the site, to track your usage of interactive features, and to communicate with you regarding site news and updates. You can opt out of all newsletters, but you may still receive occasional notices regarding your specific usage of the site. We do not share this information with outside parties unless otherwise noted at the time of data entry.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of personal information on the website to identify users, track usage, and communicate updates. Users can opt-out of newsletters, indicating a choice scope related to use. The information is not shared unless specified, implying first-party collection and use with identifiable personal information.

segment: Illini Media uses non-identifying and aggregate information to better customize our websites for your use and to share general data about those who view our websites with our advertisers. We do not disclose anything that could be used to identify individuals.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of non-identifying and aggregate information for website customization and sharing with advertisers, ensuring no identifiable information is disclosed.

segment: Illini Media partners with Google and OnCampus Advertising to serve some of the ads you see when you visit our websites.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment indicates that Illini Media partners with Google and OnCampus Advertising to serve ads, which implies sharing user data with these third parties for advertising purposes.

segment: Illini Media also uses Google Analytics that allows us to analyze data on our users' demographics (age, gender) and interests (affinity categories, other categories). Specifically, we are able analyze the this type of data:

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of Google Analytics to collect demographic and interest data from users on the website, primarily for analytics and research purposes. The data is likely aggregated or anonymized.

segment: Demographics     Overview (overview of traffic by age and gender)     Age (traffic by age ranges)     Gender (traffic by gender)

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection of demographic data, specifically traffic by age and gender, which falls under the category of first-party collection/use of demographic information.

segment: Interests     Overview (overview of traffic by affinity and other categories)     Affinity Categories (behavior by affinity categories)     In-Market Categories (behavior by in-market categories)     Other Categories (behavior by other interest categories)

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the collection and analysis of user behavior categorized by various interest categories on the website, indicating that the data is collected directly from user interactions on the site.

segment: This analysis enables us to track how our users engage over a date range, who our users are generally, and how their behavior varies by attribute (e.g., male vs. female). Illini Media may use this type of analysis to refine our advertising and content strategies.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes the use of user engagement data to analyze user behavior and attributes, which is used to refine advertising and content strategies, indicating an analytics/research purpose.

segment: Please note:     Illini Media uses Google Analytics.     Third-party vendors ads (including those served by Google) that appear on Illini Media's websites may appear across the Internet.     Illini Media and third-party vendors, including Google, use first-party cookies (such as the Google Analytics cookie) and third-party cookies (such as the DoubleClick cookie) together to inform, optimize, and serve ads based on someone's past visits to your website.     Illini Media and third-party vendors, including Google, use first-party cookies (such as the Google Analytics cookies) and third-party cookies (such as the DoubleClick cookie) together to report how our ad impressions, other uses of ad services, and interactions with these ad impressions and ad services are related to visits to your site.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how third-party vendors, including Google, collect data on Illini Media's website using cookies to serve ads and report ad interactions.

segment: Illini Media never shares personally identifiable information provided to us online in ways unrelated to the ones described above without also providing you an opportunity to opt-out or otherwise prohibit such unrelated uses. Google or any ad server may use information (not including your name, address, email address or telephone number) about your visits to this and other websites in order to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how information may be shared with third parties like Google or ad servers for advertising purposes, but excludes personally identifiable information such as name, address, email, or phone number. It also mentions user opt-out options for unrelated uses.

segment: To opt-out    You may use Google Analytics' currently available opt-outs at any time.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment provides users with an option to opt-out using a specific link or method related to Google Analytics, indicating a user choice/control mechanism.

segment: To access or correct your information    You can access all your personally identifiable information that we collect online and maintain by logging into your account and adjusting your account settings and profile information. You can correct factual errors in your personally identifiable information by sending us a request that credibly shows error. To protect your privacy and security, we will also take reasonable steps to verify your identity before granting access or making corrections.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes how users with accounts can access and edit their personally identifiable information by logging into their account and adjusting settings. It also mentions identity verification for privacy and security.

segment: Our commitment to data security    To prevent unauthorized access, maintain data accuracy, and ensure the correct use of information, we have put in place appropriate physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

model_analysis.explanation: The segment describes a commitment to data security through physical, electronic, and managerial procedures, which fits under a generic description of security measures.

The date provided appears to be a generic or introductory detail, possibly indicating when a policy or document was last updated or published, without specific context or relevance to privacy practices.
